response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant value it would bring to you, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, reflecting my confidence in its immense value to you. I believe this represents a remarkable investment that could potentially yield substantial benefits. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 1100000}
